history.proof: unfold ex_finite_lim. unfold ex_lim. unfold is_finite. hauto lq: on use: is_finite_correct, is_lim_unique unfold: is_finite.

original: unfold ex_finite_lim. unfold ex_lim. unfold is_finite. unfold Lim. intros H. split. - intros [l H']. split. apply (ex_lim _ _ H'). exists l. apply Lim_correct. apply H'. - intros [H1 H2]. destruct H1 as [l H1]. exists l. apply (Lim_correct _ _ H1).
